import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeftIcon, CreditCardIcon, TruckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/common/LoadingSpinner'; const CheckoutPage = () => { const { items, totalAmount, loading } = useCart(); const { user } = useAuth(); const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false); const handleCheckout = async () => { setIsProcessing(true); // Simulate checkout process setTimeout(() => { setIsProcessing(false); alert('Order placed successfully! (Demo)'); }, 2000); }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (
Back to Cart

Checkout

{/* Shipping Information */}

{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

{items.map((item) => (
{item.productName} x {item.quantity} ${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}
Subtotal: ${totalAmount.toFixed(2)}
Shipping: {totalAmount >= 50 ? 'Free' : '$5.99'}
Tax: ${(totalAmount * 0.08).toFixed(2)}
Total: ${(totalAmount + (totalAmount >= 50 ? 0 : 5.99) + totalAmount * 0.08).toFixed(2)}
); }; export default CheckoutPage;
